sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext, useEffect} from 'react' import RestaurantFinder from '../apis/RestaurantFinder' import { RestaurantsContext } from '../contexts/RestaurantsContext' const RestaurantList = (props) => { const [restaurants, setRestaurants] = useContext(RestaurantsContext); useEffect(() => { // To not have a promise inside useEffect, define a separate function to do it const fetchData = async() => { try { const response = await RestaurantFinder.get("/"); setRestaurants(response.data.data.restaurants); } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } fetchData(); }, []) // only runs when the page is first loaded, ie when the component mounts return (
Restaurant Location Price Range Ratings Edit Delete
Chop Chop uTown $$ Rating
Chop Chop uTown $$ Rating
Chop Chop uTown $$ Rating
) } export default RestaurantList
